---
description: Create a test issue to trigger the ADF Generation Agent
---

Create a new issue with the label `adf-generate` in the `cajetzer/cloud-agent-orchestration` repo using the GitHub CLI (`gh`).

- **Title:** Create a copy pipeline from Azure Blob Storage to Azure SQL Database
- **Body:** Use the template from [examples/sample-issue.md](../../examples/sample-issue.md)
- **Label:** `adf-generate`
